data.name: ColorBlend FX: Desaturation Prologue
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist the upcoming full game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/670510


About the Game

At the center of Splatian's Village...

Another day for the Splatians to do their everyday work...
And another evening to chill and talk around the campfire...
But this evening is special! Sparkle discovered something new about the mythical Rainbow Powder: It can change the Essence Of Objects.
The Goddess Ranina must be proud...

At deep caves under Mount Of Ranina...

Another day of Ash-Ing clan appealing how boring their work is...
And another evening... But this evening is special!
The Lord is enraged. The Splatians are disrupting his plans!
Lord Ashen consumes the Essence Of The World...

And here it begins...

ColorBlend FX: Desaturation prologue features the first chapter of our upcoming game ColorBlend FX. Here you will understand what exactly happened on that evening as well as consequences of the act of the Evil Lord Ashen. Help your buddies or let them help you overcome all obstacles and solve all puzzles, all the way to the S.P.A.R.K. University.

Splat and stomp juicy slimes, swim in paint pools, overcome deadly traps, find secrets and treasures, solve different puzzles, survive the parkour challenges and have a lot of fun in this unique 2.5D experience.
The prologue also features Steam achievements!
And if you are colorblind, don't worry - just enable colorblind mode in settings!

data.short_description: Desaturation is the prologue chapter of our upcoming game ColorBlend FX. Help Splatians blend the stolen colors back to the world and foil the plans of the Evil! Squash juicy slimes, get painted or slimed, solve puzzles, find secrets & survive the death while figuring out the evil plans of the Lord.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 6th generation or new
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or 1030 and up / AMD RX 580 and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 6th generation or new
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 or 1050 and up / AMD RX 580 and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
